sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const WeatherCard = ({newWeatherInfo}) => { const {temp, temp_min, temp_max, description, speed, place} = newWeatherInfo; return ( <>
Current Date \n {new Date().toLocaleString()}
Current Place \n {place}
Current Temp. \n {temp}
MinTemp {temp_min}
MaxTemp {temp_max}
WindSpeed {speed}
Description {description}
{/*
NewCases
TotalCases
Recovered
TotalDeath
Traffic
*/}
) } export default WeatherCard;
